name: include-fussball-de-widgets
description: Easy integration of the fussball.de widgets (currently in the version since season 2016) for Wordpress.
author: IT-Service Böhm -- Alexander Böhm

scripts.release:copy: rsync -a readme.txt LICENSE fubade-api.js *.php .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/ && rsync -a dist/blocks.build.js dist/blocks.editor.build.css .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/dist/ && rsync -a languages/ .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/languages
scripts.release:github: rsync -a .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/* .github-releases/include-fussball-de-widgets && cd .github-releases/ && zip -r include-fussball-de-widgets-vx.x.x.zip include-fussball-de-widgets/* && rm -rf include-fussball-de-widgets && cd ..
